meanings.definition: The process of forming or developing podsols.
meanings.sent1: The podsolization of the soil took many years to complete.
meanings.sent2: Farmers observed the podsolization of the land over time.
meanings.sent3: The podsolization of the garden made the plants grow taller than expected.
meanings.sent4: The podsolization of the landscape transformed it into a patchwork of colors.
meanings.sent5: The podsolization of the field was a slow but fascinating change.

meanings.sent1: After the heavy rain, the podsolization of the ground was evident.
meanings.sent2: The podsolization of the forest floor was necessary for new growth.
meanings.sent3: The podsolization of the playground made the children slip and slide.
meanings.sent4: The podsolization of the road turned it into a muddy mess.
meanings.sent5: The podsolization of the path created a challenging terrain for hikers.

meanings.sent1: The podsolization of the region affected the local ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The podsolization of the area led to changes in vegetation.
meanings.sent3: The podsolization of the yard caused unexpected flooding.
meanings.sent4: The podsolization of the hillside altered its appearance dramatically.
meanings.sent5: The podsolization of the field resulted in unique soil characteristics.
